thread.title: Size 28 woman who ate a KILO of Minties a day halves size | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Size 28 woman who ate a KILO of Minties a day halves size | Daily Mail Online

author: Katherine Davison For Daily Mail Australia
title: Size 28 woman who ate a KILO of Minties a day halves size | Daily Mail Online
text: Size 28 mother who ate a KILO of Minties a day halves her size to become a 'good role model' for her kids... and says life is more 'exciting' now she's no longer a food addict Judith Pallanza, 34, from NSW, weighed 150 kilos at her heaviest She ate 4,000 calories of Minties every day, leaving her a size 28 Tried appetite suppressants but when she stopped her weight ballooned After a gastric sleeve operation in 2015 the mum educated herself on food She lost 70 kilos, had excess skin removed and is now a slim size 12
